item.description:
NEW STUFF:
The movie starts at 6:05, so let's meet inside the ticket lobby at 5:30. Then I'll buy us all tickets and we can get snacks, etc.

This movie, presumably, was bumped from several theaters at the AMC for the Harry Potter that opened last weekend. So sorry for the early showing, but it's outta my hands!

If the earlier time affects your plans to attend, please make sure to update your RSVP, so that I know who to wait for.

Thanks and hope to see you tomorrow!

--Dana

OLD STUFF:
Megamind just may be the perfect silly animated start to Thanksgiving weekend. So come giggle with me at a movie that seems to be doing pretty well in the box office!

SUMMARY:
Megamind is the most brilliant super-villain the world has ever known... and the least successful. Over the years, he has tried to conquer Metro City in every imaginable way -- Each attempt, a colossal failure thanks to the caped superhero known as "Metro Man," until the day Megamind actually defeats him in the throes of one of his botched evil plans. Suddenly, the fate of Metro City is threatened when a new villain arrives and chaos runs rampant, leaving everyone to wonder: Can the world's biggest "mind" actually be the one to save the day?

THE USUAL STUFF:
We'll meet right inside the theater ticket lobby doors and then I can buy us all discounted tickets ($8.00 each for FMM members and their guests). I also have $3 vouchers each for small sodas and small popcorns (can be used towards a larger size). Exact change makes me like you more.

As always, guests are welcome, just be sure to include them in the RSVP so that I know who/how many to expect.

Please keep your RSVP as up-to-date as possible. And please call me if you're going to be late or need to change your RSVP after I close RSVPs on the site (2 hours before we meet). My cell is: 508/308-4897. I'm also good for directions if you get lost.

After the movie, we'll head to Unos to chat about the movie (and just chat).

I'll update the time a few days before the meetup, so keep an eye on your email!

Hope to see you for Megamind!

--Dana
508/308-4897
item.name: Megamind
